website_summaries.verdict: This cost-effective product offers buyers a set of durable plastic shopping baskets for less than $10 each.
pros: Bright red design makes spotting the basket easy
Customers were impressed with how well this set held up over time
cons: Baskets can get caught on each other if stacked together

customer_reviews.title: light, nice quality, compact size
customer_reviews.text: We are a small business and are using these for picking orders in the warehouse, and then staging them for boxing and shipping. Our products are small and light so these work well. We liked the attention getting red color. The quality is very nice. If you are thinking about these for groceries, they are smaller and lighter than what you typically find at a grocery store. I would move up to a larger size with heavier plastic construction. But if you have a store with tight spaces and small items, these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Krakski

customer_reviews.title: Very durable shopping basket
customer_reviews.text: Basket is very durable, but pulling them apart is pretty difficult, kinda defeating the purpose of customer ease. But for the price this is a fantastic deal. My boyfriend sanded down the corners (inside & outside) of each basket making more clearing so they can slip easily from each other.
customer_reviews.author: Stromer

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased these for my business, and in addition to looking much nicer than the plastic ones you more commonly see, these have a padded grip on the handles that make them more comfortable to carry. I am giving 4 stars instead of 5 because of the stand and sign, not the baskets. The stand I received was not constructed precisely, so the sign holder in the back is not centered and the back legs do not stand straight. The red sign is made out of flimsy material, and mine was bent. With a sturdy stand and rigid sign, this would definitely be a 5 star review!!
customer_reviews.author: Karthik Shetty

customer_reviews.title: Baskets for our Freezer
customer_reviews.text: We bought these baskets because we bought a small freezer for our garage and wanted to separate the food, but be able to access it easily. There was only one basket that came with the freezer, so these provide added separation of the food storage. We like them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V

customer_reviews.title: Needed item...
customer_reviews.text: As someone who must walk with a cane, these are perfect for gathering items to be moved from one place to the other. I am even able to carry multiple items up our steps.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hall

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This basket seems to be sturdy and well made. Heavy duty and the handles are made of metal. Should provide many years of use in many different applications.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie J Arvila

customer_reviews.title: Durable basket
customer_reviews.text: We got these in shortly before our Fall Sale, one was cracked in transport but held up just fine. The items we got these in specifically for are heavy items (Ammunition) and they held up great so they are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: travis carr

customer_reviews.title: Stuck like Chuck
customer_reviews.text: once you stack these, you better channel the powers of Grayskull to get them back apart. These are a cheap knockoff of the baskets you get at a supermarket. They are great, they just don't come apart easily at all, and for a convenience store that kind of sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a library bookstore for patrons to use while shopping. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Redruby

customer_reviews.title: Seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be sturdy. Haven't had in service long enough to say how durable they are.
customer_reviews.author: KATHARINE C. GILL

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Good size and great quality. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No surprises
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty much are what you expect them to be
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I use them in my garden & my tack room, and I keep one to carry bottles for my bottle calves. They are very handy for just about anything. They are very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Gift Shop
customer_reviews.text: I opened up a gift shop this summer and these were perfect. They've held up great to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Shady Dog Farm

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. They seem durable and the handle doesnt cut into your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These baskets are great! They do their job
customer_reviews.text: These baskets are great! They do their job, and they're pretty solid. The only reason I knocked a star off is that they occasionally get stuck together and it's a bit tough to pull them apart from each other. Otherwise, they're great!
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: They are very good basket
customer_reviews.text: Like. Now i need the holder. I run a resale store.
customer_reviews.author: sweetpea52

customer_reviews.title: don't feel cheap like they are going to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: Baskets are very well built, don't feel cheap like they are going to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Zach P.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not the strongest baskets I've ever used but they work for what I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: IMoutside

customer_reviews.title: Just like what you find in the grocery store
customer_reviews.text: Just like what you find in the grocery store. Very convenient when picking up my online food order. I can fit all 5 in the trunk of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Shopping baskets
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, and they work great. No problem with them sticking together like others mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ankrum

customer_reviews.title: Great little basket
customer_reviews.text: These are great for;harvesting the garden Collecting apples Getting the mail And in general carrying anything around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Tiger ll

product_meta.title: Shopping Basket (Set of 5) Durable Red Plastic with Metal Handles
product_meta.description: Size:1-(Pack)These hand baskets are a bright red color for easy visibility. The carryalls are 15.5 x 11.5 x 8 (L x W x D). These hand baskets have strong wire handles that fold down and out of the way. The containers are easily stacked and perfect placed throughout the store for customers to quickly grab when a product catches their eye. These hand baskets come in a variety of colors and qualify for money saving quantity pricing so you can mix or match the colors all around the sales area. Sold as a set of 5 red plastic shopping baskets.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars70 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
